title: Putumayo presents: African Blues (2012)
description:
Putumayo's Ã¢â‚¬Å“African BluesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (2012) chronicles the return of the blues to its African motherland.
 
It also demonstrates the burgeoning connections between West and East African musicians and performers from the blues traditional heartland in the U.S., as well as converts in Europe and shows how these connections are revolutionizing traditions on both continents.

The blues roots are in Africa but emerged and evolved as a powerful musical style in America. Now theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re reuniting in new and exciting ways.
